# alarmUpdates

**Instance Property**

An asynchronous sequence that emits events when the set of alarms changes.

## Declaration

```swift
var alarmUpdates: some AsyncSequence<Array<Alarm>, Never> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this to receive a notification when an alarm alerts, snoozes, or dismisses.

## Updating an alarm

- **AlarmManager.AlarmUpdates**: An async sequence that publishes whenever an alarm changes.
- **alarms**: Fetches all alarms from the daemon that belong to the current client.
